(Requires attunement by a creature. The properties of this item are affixed to a melee weapon.)

This item is a @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3]{locus} and can be combined with other Loci per the @UUID[Compendium.materia-dnd.rules.JournalEntry.nniVtdJB1oyk5Sa3.JournalEntryPage.zI0VWGKnYZqz6sKd]{Combining Loci} rules.

While attuned, the relic merges magically merges with a melee weapon of your choice. This can be done during a short or long rest, and requires 10 minutes to complete. Once completed, the item becomes magical.

Effect: When affixed to a melee weapon, it gains a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls.

Special: You can make your melee attack as if it was a ranged attack with distance determined by the melee weapons properties. The damage is force unless the attack would deal a different type of damage other than bludgeoning, piercing or slashing (your choice).
